title: Vampireslayer
description: Gotrek & Felix Book 6Fresh from the war in Praag, Gotrek & Felix are thrown into a new adventure when Ulrika is abducted. Travelling to the mist-shrouded land of Sylvania, the pair face a monstrous vampire intent on claiming Ulrika as his bride.READ IT BECAUSEIt's a classic vampire story, complete with haunted castles, abducted maidens (well, Ulrika) and a powerful creature of the night – but with a typically Warhammer twist, of course!THE STORYGotrek and Felix: unsung heroes of the Empire, or nothing more than common thieves and murderers? The truth perhaps lies somewhere in between, and depends entirely upon whom you ask…Dwarf slayer Gotrek Gurnisson and his sworn human companion Felix Jaeger are beset by a new and terrible foe in their unceasing war against Chaos. When a powerful evil forms in darkest Sylvania, it threatens to reach out and tear the very heart out of the Empire – and out of Felix's relationship with Ulrika. But when this foe is a powerful, centuries old vampire, the deadly battle can only result in death and tragedy.
author: William King
